name: 24MMM Demo
description:
Working prototype for beta testing purposes only

Controls:

WASD: MOVE

Q: Swap Weapon

Space: Attack

F: Interact

E: Quest/Logs/Settings

Tab: Inventory

Right-Click: Use item in inventory

Middle-Mouse: Drag items in inventory (only works if no item is "readied")

G: Cure NPC using Antidote (only works if Antidote is "readied")

Esc: Skip dialogue
